replies.body:
Hey,

Any way I can get my new map added for the testing?
http://avicus.net/forums/cb94355fa

Also, is this testing on Saturday to find out if ymls are not working, or will the devs already have them corrected, or.. do you have to test to find out what is wrong with the ymls?

Thanks so much!
replies.body_tagged:
Hey,

Any way I can get my new map added for the testing?
http://avicus.net/forums/cb94355fa

Also, is this testing on Saturday to find out if ymls are not working, or will the devs already have them corrected, or.. do you have to test to find out what is wrong with the ymls?

Thanks so much!

replies.body:
In the Map Testing event, we test maps that are fully working, in order to decide which ones should go in the map rotations. If a map is not working, and has been accepted, me and Para will try to fix anything that is wrong with it in order to have it available for testing this Saturday.
Maps that have good gameplay will be added to the map rotations, and maps that don't play good at all will be denied.

I hope I made a good explaination haha
replies.body_tagged:
In the Map Testing event, we test maps that are fully working, in order to decide which ones should go in the map rotations. If a map is not working, and has been accepted, me and Para will try to fix anything that is wrong with it in order to have it available for testing this Saturday.
Maps that have good gameplay will be added to the map rotations, and maps that don't play good at all will be denied.

I hope I made a good explaination haha

replies.body:
Thanks Evocal - great answer. 

In my feeble attempt to get better at ymls -  If you have to fix any of my map yml's , would you please tell me what you had to fix, so I do not do it again? And if any of my Ymls are so messed up you cant get them to work please let me know as much info as you have so I can spend some time working on them. I really hate not knowing if my submitted work is not correct ( I make  all the new ymls from scratch) - I don't want you to have to clean up my mess. - Thank again, and please let me know if your able to add the lost island map. I also updated most of my YMLs the other day on the maps original threads - if you need them. Please see all my maps and new ymls links below:

My currently Submitted  maps:

1. http://avicus.net/forums/cb94355fa - Lost Island (new) 
2. http://avicus.net/forums/7c6b18669 - Dark Wood (updated yml) 
3. http://avicus.net/forums/b743eab2f - The Cove ( updated yml )
4. http://avicus.net/forums/24656bf12 - Paper Planes ( updated yml )
.

replies.body:
Quick question:
If we discover a map's gameplay is just pure shite and denied, can we take the feedback/suggestions gained from the testing and re-submit it or is it all over if it gets denied?

also is the list in order of which map goes first during testing?
replies.body_tagged:
Quick question:
If we discover a map's gameplay is just pure shite and denied, can we take the feedback/suggestions gained from the testing and re-submit it or is it all over if it gets denied?

also is the list in order of which map goes first during testing?

replies.body: Yeah, I did the same... You can always remake the map and resubmit it. The order of the maps is pretty random, they mix all gamemodes together.

replies.body:
Uh... bad news. Ivy wasn't able to properly update the maps repo as it glitched; our changes have not been made and I assume he will be trying to fix it soon. Just a heads up that the event may NOT occur due to these difficulties. Do not get angry at the dev team as these things sometimes happen.

Any questions you can forward below. Once the issue is fixed, a topic will be made reintroducing ME2 and the maps list will be updated. Sorry for the last minute troubles.

On the positive side, we've gotten a lot of work done. MDs will be regularly released and the work will finally pay off!
replies.body_tagged:

On the positive side, we've gotten a lot of work done. MDs will be regularly released and the work will finally pay off!
